The weather in Smallenske

Smolenska and the field. Main developments in the city

23 minutes ago
Smile for creative family photos can win a trip to the NCA.
Applications for young families were extended until 5 February. He accepts creative photographs of the Pushkin Youth Centre. Work will be evaluated by popular vote.
Today, 22:10
Smurfishers check arms owners
Officials of the Rosgvard ' s Office ' s licence and clearance units in the Smole region have conducted over 100 verification activities in the area of arms trafficking over a week.
Today, 22:08
The head of the Roslav region of the Smole region resigned
The Officer-in-Charge of the Regional Office for Internal Affairs, Dmitri Bluechenko.
Today, 21:05
In Smolenske, heating resumed following the accident in the Zadniprov region
The leak in the area of the Friday wire was discovered yesterday. Tonight, Quadra reported thatrepair completedand the heater is supplied.
Today, 19:49
On its anniversary of the intronization of the patriarchy, Kirill wished all the Moles a long summer.
The words of His Holiness were transmitted to Governor Vasili Anohin, who, at the invitation of the patriarch, participated in the holiday service.
Today, 19:40
In the Smole region, the number of injuries on the railway has declined.

Data for 2023 were shared by the MWC. The Slovenians call for compliance with safety regulations within the railway infrastructure.

Today, 19:15
Smolone stole and destroyed a car of a friend.

The accused in three crimes was fined.

Today, 18:43
The court returned the actor of Markowkin to the Smole chamber theatre.
Markovkin applied to the court for recognition of his dismissal as illegal, for reinstatement at work, for payment during forced walks and for compensation for moral harm.
Today, 18:13
Where to go to Smallensca in the first February weekend
In the Year of the Family, many interesting recreational activities with loved ones and loved ones have been prepared. This weekend is no exception! The fair games, fresh air interacts, bottoms and Harry Potter's party are already waiting for you...
Today, 17:33
Following the death of a person due to a bear attack in the Smole province, criminal proceedings were initiated
ICR reported on the results of the M1 Road Café fatal examination. The investigation is under the control of the District Attorney.
Today, 16:48
In Smolenske, welding work on the Friday belt was completed

AS Quadr ' s affiliate in social networks described this. Let's remind you, yesterday, a leak was detected in the area of the Five Puncture. Today, 1 February, without hot water and heating, there were houses on the Queen, the Paddy and the surrounding streets.

Today, 16:12
Smolan and his partner grabbed TSB team sites and ran the counterattack.
The story of two fighters was on the federal channel. NTW presented the 61-year-old follican with the Fenix and his 39-year-old partner Deda, who they had carried out on the NPD. Both have served in one unit since January...
Today, 15:35
Wet snow and a strong wind. Synoptics described the weather on 2 February in the Smole region
The last day of the working week is a little cold, but it'll be warmer this weekend.
Today, 14:59
In the Smole region, rail crossings will be blocked

They told me about it at the MWC. Tomorrow, 2 February, the Vyazem district will be closed by the g/d relocation to Semlev Station.

Today, 14:21
Murder bear. SKR and the Public Prosecutor ' s Office commented on the tragedy in the Smole region

Remind me, there was earlier information in the social media about the M-1 track café on 225 mile.Terrible tragedy- Balu bear, over 20 years.living here in a cageI'm a man.

Today, 14:01
The Serbs voted to increase the age of the First Movement to 25 years
The delegation of the Smole region participates in the organization ' s second congress at the Rosia exhibition in Moscow, the age limit of the First Movement will be increased from 18 to 25 years. The decision was taken at the second congress of the organization. He's so...
Today, 12:48
In Smole province, up to 400,000 roubles increased the payment of contractors
More than half of this amount is from the Government of the region.
Today, 11:37
In the Smole region, the bear living in the café killed a man
The tragedy took place yesterday, 31 January, on the M-1 track in the Vyazem district.
Today, 11:02
How is the repair going, which has left thousands of moles without heating?
We will recall yesterday that members of the Quadra Smole branch reported that leaks had been detected in the area of the Friday Puncture. The repair's already started.
Today, 10:43
The city of Smolenska called a 3,000-year-old rumour show.
On 31 January, it was reported to the social media that a 100-fold sum had been written off at the handicapped cart.
